transform_def.name: designed35
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan(length(p_in) + cos(abs(sin(p_in.x) * tan(length(p_in) + abs(sin(p_in.y)))))) t = tan(abs(p_in.x) + abs(p_in.y)) / tan(length(p_in) + abs(tan(p_in.x) * (abs(tan(p_in.y)) * tan(fourpi()))) + abs(cos(p_in.x))) z = tan(lerp(s, t, r)) * (r * halfpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
